tweets.text:
We are delighted to have added two new talks to PiXL Stretch on microplastic pollution from the @EnvAgency.

At a time when this issue has never been more important to understand, we hope you might like to share these with students. 

Launch PiXL Stretch: https://t.co/fUNMzJ9u6Z https://t.co/F4ocDti8oc

A mile of the River Lugg has been bulldozed to destruction.
Bankside trees grubbed out & burnt.
Riverbed scraped out.
Meanders reprofiled.
Disaster for downstream wildlife.
This was an SSSI.
No consent was sought. 
@EnvAgency must surely prosecute this.
